item.description:
Join me for "Dollar Mania" at East Providence Lanes. We will meet at 9:15pm to figure out teams/lanes. Please note that if a lot of people are signed up, we may not be able to bowl right next to each other, depending on how busy the alley is, since we cannot reserve lanes.

From East Providence Lanes web site [http://www.eastprovid...

Monday thru Thursday (9:30pm - 1:00am)
$1.00 a Game and $1.00 for Shoes
$1 Hot Dog – $1 French Fries – $1 Small Soda

Usually we play 2 games, so the total cost for bowling is $3.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting at the main entrance (the sliding doors) of the bowling alley
item.name: Dollar Bowling @ East Providence Lanes
